thread.title: Great hotel, amazing location
thread.title_full: Great hotel, amazing location - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SerendipFindsYou
title: Great hotel, amazing location
text: Just a short walk away from Oxford Street, this hotel is in a fantastic location. Stayed here 3 nights while in London. Rooms were clean and staff were always helpful when needed. It isn't too cheap but that is to be expected when staying in this calibre of accommodation in London. Overall would stay here again.
